channel.title: The GAMSAT Podcast
channel.description: The GAMSAT Podcast features three great shows released each week. 1. Keeping it 100 with Tom from The Medical Method interviewing GAMSAT overachievers. 2. Task C with Aleks Hammo discussing ideas you can use in your approach to Section 2 Essays. 3. Mailbag with Scott Fraser and guests, discussing FAQs and emails from the week. We're brought to you by Fraser's GAMSAT Tuition, you can find out about what we do at https://frasersgamsat.com.au or email us at info@frasersgamsat.com.au
channel.author: Thomas Kelly
channel.itunes:author: Thomas Kelly

Task C with Aleks Hammo discussing ideas you can use in your approach to Section 2 Essays. 3. Mailbag with Scott Fraser and guests, discussing FAQs and emails from the week. We're brought to you by Fraser's GAMSAT Tuition, you can find out about what we do at https://frasersgamsat.com.au or email us at info@frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: The GAMSAT is On...Line In May!
item.description: In these times of uncertainty the GAMSAT has been delayed to May and shifted online. Tom and Scott analyse all the changes, how this is likely to affect the exam and how you should prepare for it. We've worked tirelessly to launch the new GAMSAT Continuity programs that are specifically designed to take students from March to the May exam. We're running things online and redesigning our strategic approach to the online GAMSAT. These programs are heavily discounted and subsidised at our cost to ensure our students get the best results. Find out more about the continuity programs at: www.frasersgamsat.com.au/frasers-gamsat-prep-course-may/
item.dc:creator: Thomas Kelly

item.title: GAMSAT For English As A Second Language | Keeping It 100
item.description:
Our guest today is Qing, who is a first-year medical student and one of our tutors in Section 3. For lots of ESL students like her, essay writing for Section 2 is one of the biggest hurdles in GAMSAT preparation. Listen to how she used these circumstances as an advantage and scored over 70 in Section 2.

You can also read a blog article written by Qing here.

item.title: What Will GAMSAT March Look Like? | GAMSAT 2020
item.description: Arshad is joined by Lauren, who is a student experience manager at Fraser's. In this episode, the pair looks at the trends of GAMSAT 2019 March and September analysing each section. Based on the takeaways from previous GAMSATs, Lauren and Arshad provide their insights into what the GAMSAT 2020 March will look like. Check out the prediction for the upcoming GAMSAT to be game ready!
item.dc:creator: Thomas Kelly

item.title: GAMSAT Section 1, 2 & 3 Questions Breakdown | GAMSAT 2020
item.description: This episode of The GAMSAT Podcast takes you through GAMSAT questions by section and how difficult they are. Joe, a second-year medical student at Deakin University, is looking back on his experience with each GAMSAT section. What kind of questions would be the most difficult for biomed/medsci students like Joe? Listen to his story to find out!

item.title: GAMSAT Scores Deep Dive | GAMSAT 2020
item.description:
Calculating your GAMSAT scores correctly is vital for your strategy to apply to universities and get into medicine. However, lots of students misunderstand how the GAMSAT is scored. This episode of GAMSAT Scores Deep Dive breaks down how the GAMSAT scoring system works, using the concept of "Merged Rank".

We're joined by Kristian Stanceski who sat GAMSAT three times until he received offers this year. He is also the author of an article on GAMSAT scores published on our blog here: https://www.frasersgamsat.com.au/gamsat-scores/

item.title: 70+ Three Times with Kristian | GAMSAT 2020
item.description:
Tom is joined by our student and now tutor, Kristian Stanceski, who recently got offers from Melbourne and Sydney University. He shares his struggle getting into medicine despite gaining 70+ three times on GAMSAT.
Check out what the biggest hurdle was for Kristian and how he prepared for GAMSAT.
Email questions to the show at tom@frasersgamsat.com.auand you can see what we do at frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: Medical School GAMSATs & GPAs | Section 4
item.description: Tom and Eden discuss applying for Medicine through the GEMSAS process. Including all the GAMSATs & GPAs you need for all the different medical schools. You can download the Score Table on our website.  Email questions to the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: Learning from the March GAMSAT 2019 | Keeping It 100
item.description:
Tom interviews three students that recently completed the March GAMSAT. Discussing the questions, trends from year to year and how this should impact your study.

Email questions to the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: Three Days Left Before The GAMSAT | Mailbag
item.description:
The Last Mailbag Episode before the March 2019 GAMSAT, Scott interviews Tom with all his student questions in the lead up to the exam.

Some of the topics
"How to improve Section 1 quickly"
"How to approach GAMSAT Graphs"
"How to manage Exam Stress"
and more...

We also advise all students to be using Headspace, at headspace.com, meditating regularly will help you execute calmly in the exam but also in your future studies and life in general.

Take care of yourselves and good luck for the exam.

Email the show at tom@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at https://frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: 2 Weeks Away From A 5th GAMSAT With Zun | Keeping It 100
item.description:
In this episode of Keeping It 100, Tom interviews Zun about his GAMSAT journey, from sitting it without any preparation to getting 70 after doing the Fraser's GAMSAT Course and finally, going in for a 5th sit this March 2019 GAMSAT with 70 already in the bank from the September 2018 GAMSAT.

This episode explores how to best use the ACER exams in your preparation, changing your mindset "The GAMSAT as a Game approach" and how an Honours year can really accelerate your medical career.

Email questions to the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: How To Study For The GAMSAT In 1 Month | Mailbag
item.description:
In the second episode of the Mailbag, Scott interviews Tom with student questions from the last month of study before GAMSAT 2019. 

Some of the questions they cover in the episode include Studying As A Full Timer, ACER's Test Questions and their impacts on your score, How To Use The ACER Papers, GAMSAT Section 1 Poetry and more.

Email the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at https://frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: Scoring 71 to 88 in 4 GAMSATs with Dr. Scott Fraser | Keeping it 100
item.description:
In this episode of Keeping it 100, Tom interviews Dr. Scott Fraser about his 4 GAMSAT sits and what we can learn from his experiences.

We talk about how the GAMSAT has changed and what we think it may look like going into March GAMSAT 2019, you can also read an article we wrote on the topic by clicking here: March GAMSAT 2019 Blog Article

Email questions to the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: Purpose - "Man Is A Useless Passion" | Task C
item.description:
In Episode 1 of Task C, your host Aleks walks Tom through a fundamental idea from 20th century existentialism – purpose. They look at a famous quote from Jean-Paul Sartre, who explained his work in ‘Being and Nothingness’ that “Man is a useless passion”. Contemplating Freedom and Free Will they talk about how to best use these ideas in your essays.

After watching or listening to this episode, you should have an understanding of ideas relating to purpose, meaning, identity, nihilism (purposelessness), freedom, free-will, values and ethics.

Email the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at frasersgamsat.com.au 

You can listen to Aleks at "Aleks and Liam Talk" where they talk to intellectuals like Julian Burnside and Dr. Rebecca Allen

item.title: GAMSAT Scores Are Going Down | The Mailbag
item.description:
This week's mailbag episode is dedicated to GAMSAT Scores.
We get a lot of questions about how scores work and there are a lot of myths in this space. Tom systematically answers your questions and debunks the prevailing mythology surrounding GAMSAT Scores. Including an analysis in the medians of most recent GAMSAT scores and how that is likely to affect future applications.
This is the downloadable table with GAMSAT scores and GPAs from 2018 entrance, https://docs.wixstatic.com/ugd/c6bfc5_9cc36b76ff10472ea4dc7a477de07fab.pdf
You can also read the whole article here https://www.frasersinterview.com.au/single-post/2018/07/04/How-difficult-did-you-find-it-choosing-which-medical-school-to-apply-for
As always if you have any questions don't hesitate to email us at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at Fraser's at https://frasersgamsat.com.au

item.title: 98 in Section 3 with Joshua Zhang | Keeping it 100
item.description: Tom interviews Josh Zhang. He scored 81 in March 2018 with 98 in Section 3. They discuss the best approach to Section 3, how to best use your time and the balance between theory and reasoning. The first episode of Keeping it 100. Email the show at info@frasersgamsat.com.au and you can see what we do at https://frasersgamsat.com.au
